Table	Create Table
validation_rules	CREATE TABLE `validation_rules` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `ruleKey` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `ruleName` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `description` text DEFAULT NULL,
  `ruleType` enum('boolean','numeric','text') NOT NULL,
  `enabled` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `numericValue` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `textValue` text DEFAULT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */,
  UNIQUE KEY `validation_rules_ruleKey_unique` (`ruleKey`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_bin AUTO_INCREMENT=30001
